metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. o Form mixture into flat cakes. o Fry in hot oil until golden. o Drain on paper towels and serve warm.
o Prepare each side dish separately. o Arrange on small plates. o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

o Mix rice flour, water, coconut milk, salt, and sugar to form a batter. o Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set. o Saut√© chopped shrimp and green onions until cooked. o Top steamed cakes with shrimp, green onions, and fried shallots. o Serve with dipping sauce.
